title: Super Slicer
description:
WÜSTHOF’S best-selling collection for generations, CLASSIC full-tang knives are precision-forged from a single piece of an exclusive high-carbon stain-free steel. CLASSIC knives feature a new handle design made of a highly durable synthetic material – Polyoxymethylene (POM) – which has a tighter molecular structure to resist fading and discoloration.

The 10" Super Slicer is a long slender blade with a rounded tip. The blade is longer than many other knives so that it can slice across large roasts in one swift movement. The scalloped edge cuts though meat such as turkey without damaging it, bread without compressing it and tomatoes without squashing them.

asset.author: WusthofUSA

transcripts:
Hi, Chef Mike here with Wusthof-Trident of America. And today, I'm going to talk about my absolute favorite knife, the Super Slicer. The Super Slicer is a single-bevel reverse scallop knife. It's a great slicing knife. That single bevel allows you to get really, really thin slices, or you can also do really thick slices. 

Now, it's great for melons. It's great for cabbage. Great for large tomatoes. Also really good for cooked meats, for raw meats. And it's absolutely my favorite knife for skinning salmon. 

Now, when you skin the salmon, you're just going to get under the flesh here. Once you get it here, you're going to pull back. We're going to use a back-and-forth motion. I'm going to pull with my left hand, go through. And this is why this is a favorite knife of chefs all over. 

You can see this. It actually separates the flesh from the skin, does a great job on that. This is the reverse scallop Super Slicer single-bevel knife. Great for planing off thin or thick cuts.
